name: LitMan Item Stack And Container Size - Recompiled
description:
A Recompile from LitMan Item Stack And Container Size

This is for the new version which includes the Isle of Siptah addon

The old Version:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1125427722

The GitLab from Litman
https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled


Item stack increased 10 times & Containers Size increased 10 times.

Does not Stacks Armor, Weapons and Pet Items.

Best used with "LitMan Increased Weight - Recompiled".

Does not work with "LitMan Item Stack" and "LitMan Container Size".

Mod ID:
author: Marty Shephard
